articles.description: A first major final between Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner always promised to deliver - but few expected it to reach the heights that it did.
articles.title: French Open 2025 final: Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner thriller proves rivalry here to stay

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is in tears as he wins a third trophy with Portugal - could the Nations League save his manager Roberto Martinez's job?
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo tears & Lamine Yamal's nemesis - has Nations League win saved Roberto Martinez?

articles.description: England continue their dominance over West Indies as a four-wicket win in the second T20 at Bristol seals the series with a game to spare.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Jos Buttler top-scores in chase of 197 to win second T20 at Bristol and seal series victory

articles.description: It was a final so engrossing it briefly paused the Spanish's men's football team's warm-up - how the sporting world reacted to Carlos Alcaraz's stunning French Open victory.
articles.title: French Open 2025 final: Praise for 'King Carlos' Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner after epic Roland Garros showpiece

articles.description: Poland's record goalscorer Robert Lewandowski says he will not play for his country while Michal Probierz is manager after being replaced as the team's captain.
articles.title: Robert Lewandowski: Barcelona striker quits Poland after losing trust in manager Michal Probierz

articles.description: Just as brother Jude did before him, Jobe Bellingham is set to move from the Championship to Bundesliga giants Borussia Dortmund.
articles.title: 'Own identity' - Jobe Bellingham follows similar path to brother Jude

articles.description: In his own press conference, Luciano Spalletti reveals he has been sacked as Italy's head coach after his side lost 3-0 to Norway in a World Cup qualifier on Friday. But he will still take charge of their game against Moldova on Monday.
articles.title: Luciano Spalletti: Italy boss reveals his own sacking during press conference

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Germany vs France in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: Germany vs France: UEFA Nations League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Uriah Rennie, the Premier League's first black referee, dies at the age of 65.
articles.title: Uriah Rennie: First black Premier League referee dies aged 65

articles.description: Manchester City want to sign France midfielder Rayan Cherki from Lyon, but who is he exactly and why is everybody so excited about him?
articles.title: Rayan Cherki: 'One of Europe's greatest technicians' - why Man City want French 'genius'
